Sentencas: Internal reforming is an attractive option offering a significant cost reduction, higher efficiencies and faster load response of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plant.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: However, complete internal reforming may lead to several problems which can be avoided with partial pre-reforming of natural gas.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: In order to achieve high total plant efficiency associated with low energy consumption and low investment costs, a process concept has been developed based on all the components of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: In the case of anode gas recycling an internal steam circuit exists.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: This has the advantage that there is no need for an external steam generator and the steam concentration in the anode gas is reduced.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: However, anode gas recycling has to be proven by experiments in a pre-reformer and for internal reforming.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: The addition of carbon dioxide clearly shows a decrease in catalyst activity, while for temperatures higher than 1000 K hydrogen leads to an increase of the measured methane conversion rates.
Titulo: Internal reforming of methane in solid oxide fuel cell systems
